mapper.select: SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qnaBdNum, TITLE, QS_DATE AS qnaDate, REG_DATE AS regDate, QS_CNT AS qnaCnt, USER_NAME AS userName FROM T_BEDU_QS ORDER BY QS_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_QS( USER_NAME, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT, QS_LIKE_CNT, QS_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( #{userName}, #{title}, #{content}, #{qnaCnt}, #{qnaLikeCnt}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{regId} )
mapper.select: SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qnaBdNum, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT AS qnaCnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qnaLikeCnt, QS_DATE AS qnaDate, REG_ID AS regId, u.USER_NAME AS userName, u.USER_NUM AS userNum FROM T_BEDU_QS q LEFT JOIN T_BEDU_USER u ON q.USER_NAME = u.USER_NAME WHERE QS_BD_NUM = #{num}

SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_NAME, QS_CNT AS qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qna_like_yn, QS_DATE AS qna_date, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_QS
WHERE TITLE LIKE concat('%', #{title}, '%') OR CONTENT LIKE concat('%', #{content}, '%')
ORDER BY QS_BD_NUM DESC
SELECT USER_ID as userId FROM T_BEDU_USER WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName}
SELECT USER_NAME as userName FROM T_BEDU_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(LIKE_NUM) FROM T_BEDU_LIKE_CNT WHERE qs_bd_num=#{qsnum} AND USER_NAME=#{userid} AND LIKE_YN=#{likeyn}
